definitions.definition: A person of preeminent qualities, who acts as a pattern or model for others.
definitions.example: In the novel, Constanza is a paragon of virtue who would never compromise her reputation.

definitions.definition: A companion; a match; an equal.
The size of type between great primer and double pica, standardized as 20-point.
A flawless diamond of at least 100 carats.
To compare; to parallel; to put in rivalry or emulation with.
To compare with; to equal; to rival.
To serve as a model for; to surpass.
To be equal; to hold comparison.
